summary: Pacman: The Decentralized Leverage Yield & Liquidity Aggregation Protocol - Pacman is a decentralized leverage yield and liquidity aggregation protocol on Ethereum and zkSync. It offers concentrated liquidity, unique vetokenomics, and an ETH liquidity extension aggregator. Pacman provides leverage yield strategy services for ETH trading pairs through the CFOO model and improves the basic apys and capital utilization of ETH. It also has a product roadmap that includes ongoing development, basic product development, launch of automated leverage strategy products, integration with more Arbitrum and zkSync projects, and AI strategy-driven investment and multichain implementation.
